# Littlebox Strapi Suite

> Optimize your docs for LLMs to read and index.

## Overview
- [Before Starting](before-starting.mdx) - Welcome to the Littlebox Strapi Suite documentation.
- [Community Support](community-support.mdx) - Community support and resources.
- [Contributing](contributing.mdx) - Help us improve and continue to offer quality products to the community!
- [License](license.mdx) - MIT License information.
- [Repositories](repositories.mdx) - Official repositories list.

## Backend
### Get Started
- [Introduction](backend/introduction.mdx) - Welcome to the backend documentation.
- [Installation](backend/installation.mdx) - Learn how to install the Littlebox Strapi Suite Plugin.
### Guides
- [Menus](backend/guides/menus.mdx) - Learn how to create dynamic menus and connect them to the frontend using the API.
- [Page Attributes](backend/guides/page-attributes.mdx) - Learn how to use a page's attributes.
- [Parameters](backend/guides/parameters.mdx) - Learn how to create parameters and connect them to the frontend using the API.
- [Sitemap](backend/guides/sitemap.mdx) - Learn how to manage sitemaps.
- [Slug](backend/guides/slug.mdx) - Learn how to create slugs and connect them to the frontend using the API.
- [Translations](backend/guides/translations.mdx) - Learn how to create translations and connect them to the frontend using the API.

## Frontend
### Get Started
- [Introduction](frontend/introduction.mdx) - Welcome to the Littlebox Strapi Suite Frontend documentation.
- [Installation](frontend/installation.mdx) - Learn how to install the Littlebox Strapi Suite Frontend.
### Guides
- [Essentials](frontend/guides/essentials.mdx) - Understand the core structure and essential files of the frontend framework.
- [Attributes](frontend/guides/attributes.mdx) - Learn how to use attributes to configure your pages.
- [Cache](frontend/guides/cache.mdx) - Learn how the framework uses caching to optimize performance.
- [Internationalization](frontend/guides/internationalization.mdx) - Learn how the framework handles multi-language support and connects with Strapi.
- [SEO](frontend/guides/seo.mdx) - Learn how to manage SEO metadata and structured data in the frontend framework.
- [Menu](frontend/guides/menu.mdx) - Learn how to integrate dynamic menus from Strapi into your frontend.
- [Parameters](frontend/guides/parameters.mdx) - Learn how to access global configuration values in your frontend application.
- [Slug](frontend/guides/slug.mdx) - Learn how to use slugs to connect URLs to your data.
- [Templates](frontend/guides/templates.mdx) - Learn how to use templates to control page structure and data.

## Hosting
- [Plans](hosting/plans.mdx) - Premium Strapi and NextJS hosting for your business.

## Customizations
- [Customizations](customizations.mdx) - Learn how to customize the platform to fit your needs.
